Trade/Device Name(s): Vysis LSI EGR1 SpectrumOrange/D5S23, D5S721 SpectrumGreen Probes
Regulation Name(s): Gene expression profiling test system for breast cancer prognosis
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Vysis EGR1 FISH Probe Kit using FISH DNA probes to detect EGR1 (5q31) deletions in bone marrow for AML prognosis
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to detect deletion of the LSI EGR1 probe target on chromosome 5q in bone marrow specimens as an aid in determining prognosis at AML diagnosis, used in conjunction with cytogenetics and other clinical information.
